author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Tajinder Singh: Indian Idol finalist Tajinder reveals the secret of power-packed performance | Hindi Movie News
text: One of the finalists of 'Indian Idol 9', Tajinder Singh , solidly bats for quality reality shows . In a recent chat with us, he said, "Reality shows like 'Indian Idol ' have a great role to play. They not only hone your skills and provide you an excellent platform, they also make you a power-packed performer. And that is what makes it easy for you to glide ahead in your career. I'm all for reality shows like this."
